Package game.items

Class FlaskOfCrimsonTears

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.FlaskOfCrimsonTears
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, Consumable, Resettable
public class FlaskOfCrimsonTears extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item implements Consumable, Resettable
A class FlaskOfCrimsonTears that inherits from abstract class. Implements Consumable as can be consumed to heal 250 health initially. Implements Resettable as it reset its uses back to 2. Created by:
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bryan Wong Modified by:, Po Han Tay

  • Constructor Details

    • FlaskOfCrimsonTears

      public FlaskOfCrimsonTears(int uses) throws Exception
      FlaskOfCrimsonTears Constructor. Will call the Item parent constructor to set its respective data attributes.\ The displayChar will be set to ':' as a Placeholder as the Flask Of Crimson Tears cannot be dropped, so thus have no display on the map. Will set portable to false as the Flask cannot be dropped or picked up.
      Parameters:
      uses - : The number of uses the Flask Of Crimson Tears has.
      Throws:
      Exception - if failed to set the number of uses.

    • tick

      public void tick(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Location currentLocation, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor actor)
      Inform a carried FlaskOfCrimsonTears of the passage of time. This method is called once per turn, if the FlaskOfCrimsonTears is being carried. Creates a ConsumeAction and add that to the list of Actions for the FlaskOfCrimsonTears.
      Overrides:
      tick in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - The location of the actor carrying this Item.
      actor - The actor carrying this Item.
